roleset.name: indicative of

example.name: Both args
example.text: The town's generous library budget is significant of the value its residents place on learning .
example.arg: of the value its residents place on learning

example.name: with GOL
example.text: In truth, the electoral result seemed significant to me of the fact that, as I have thought and said for many years now, this country is quite politically ill.
example.arg: of the fact that, as I have thought and said for many years now, this country is quite politically ill

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ, signify.01.

roleset.name: notable in size or importance

example.name: arg1
example.text: And though the size of the loan guarantees approved yesterday is significant , recent experience with a similar program in Central America indicates that it could take several years before the new Polish government can fully use the aid effectively .
example.arg: the size of the loan guarantess approved yesterday

example.name: With PRD, CAU
example.text: ... the Base Flagpole is significant as an object for its important symbolic and traditional associations with the origins and history of Williams Air Force Base (now Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport).
example.arg: for its important symbolic and traditional associations with the origins and history of Williams Air Force Base (now Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport).

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data.
